name: Aarav Sharma
advice: Maintain your current routine, Aarav! Keep up regular workouts and a balanced diet.

name: Sara Khan
advice: Hi Sara! Try to reduce sugar intake and include light daily walks. A small start makes a big difference!

name: Rohan Das
advice: Rohan, add more protein and healthy carbs to your diet. Consider strength training.

name: Priya Mehra
advice: Priya, you’re right on the line. Start light cardio and cut down processed foods.

name: Ankit Verma
advice: Ankit, start brisk walking daily and limit fried snacks.

name: Meena Raju
advice: Meena, you’re doing great! Stay active and eat balanced meals.

name: Dev Patel
advice: Dev, time to swap sugar drinks for water and add 30 mins walking.

name: Aisha Sheikh
advice: Aisha, keep your current lifestyle — maybe add yoga for variety.

name: Rahul Joshi
advice: Rahul, reduce portion sizes and increase daily movement gradually.

name: Kavya Sen
advice: Kavya, cut late-night snacks and walk after meals.

name: Imran Ali
advice: Imran, solid range. Maintain it with regular check-ins and stretching.

name: Sneha Kulkarni
advice: Sneha, keep your meals nutrient-dense and hydration up.

name: Vikram Raj
advice: Vikram, aim to cut down on fried foods and start morning walks.

name: Nisha Rao
advice: Nisha, balanced BMI! Just stay consistent with your habits.

name: Aditya Jain
advice: Aditya, focus on reducing sugary foods and add cardio 4x a week.

name: Shreya Nair
advice: Shreya, maintain your balance and include iron-rich foods.

name: Tanmay Bhat
advice: Tanmay, great range! Add 2 rest days weekly and hydrate well.

name: Divya Menon
advice: Divya, try home-cooked meals and set small weekly weight goals.

name: Harsh Gupta
advice: Harsh, consider meal prep and 10k steps daily for 3 weeks straight.

name: Neha Sinha
advice: Neha, your BMI is ideal. Maintain it by balancing carbs and protein.

name: Icey
advice: Stay active by incorporating at least 30 minutes of exercise into your daily routine. Choose a variety of foods like fruits, vegetables, lean proteins, and whole grains to maintain a balanced diet. Remember to stay hydrated by drinking plenty of water throughout the day. Keep up the good work!
